metadata.name: Web3 Marketing Membership
metadata.description: _Web3 Marketing: A Handbook for the Next Internet Revolution_ by Amanda Cassatt is the essential book for anyone looking to understand the next era of the internet and start building. The Web3 Marketing Membership is a pass to a token-gated community on Telegram where members can directly contact the author, access exclusive new content, get questions answered, and meet other web3 marketing minds. Each copy of the digital or print book includes a unique claim code that allows one Membership NFT to be minted. Get your copy today on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/1394171951?ref_=cm_sw_r_cp_ud_dp_JEX7BRC4G879K0W17364).
